events.title: White House Easter Egg Roll 2025
events.description: A cherished American tradition since 1878, the Easter Egg Roll is set to welcome 40,000 attendees this year. The event features egg rolling, musical performances, celebrity appearances, and educational activities.

events.title: Coachella 2025
events.description: The iconic music and arts festival in Indio, California, featuring performances by Post Malone, BLACKPINK's Jennie, Ed Sheeran, and more. The event also includes art installations and celebrity appearances.
